divs: Sighting DetailsHello, greetings from Santa Marta, Colombia, South America. From childhood I have been convinced that we planted a seed here and genetically manipulated by beings from other worlds through the ages. I've always been fascinated by the Pleiades and Orion's Belt, do not know why, but I think we come from there. In 2008 I had the privilege of observing an object lens-shaped, reddish in full, no sound, no flashing lights and had traveled with a constant speed from east to west with direction to the Caribbean Sea. Unfortunately I have no photographic record of the event, neither witnesses because I was alone in the apartment, they were all traveling, it happened around 9 pm. What it made me curious is that after 10 minutes, a helicopter Bell 212 type base of the police anti-narcotics, flew over the city with the lights off for more than 15 minutes. On April 22, 2011, a nephew of mine, was taking photographs at sunset in the city of Barranquilla with a cell phone, and was surprised to see in the picture an object with the naked eye saw not, but I believe that emits light own, because they stay in the picture like a shadow (attached shipping the original photo).
Summary: Lenticular object round, reddish, without sound, fully illuminated.
